snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration is considering a waiver for a group that is trying to re-establish whooping cranes and teach them to migrate.
abstract: Federal Aviation Administration is considering a waiver for a group that is trying to re-establish whooping cranes and teach them to migrate; Operation Migration flies small, open planes, masquerading as a mother crane so that young cranes will follow them on migration routes.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Aviation Administration is considering a waiver for a group that is trying to re-establish whooping cranes and teach them to migrate.

headline.seo: F.A.A. Grounds Plane Leading Operation Migration Whooping Cranes
headline.main: Sport Plane Taking Birds to Florida Is Grounded
headline.print_headline: Sport Plane Taking Birds To Florida Is Grounded
